EmailTemplate.name: Notify Applicant to enter Additional Information
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Provide Additional Information for Pre- Application #{!PreApplication__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Subject: Notification to provide additional information for Pre- Application# {!PreApplication__c.Name}for the Announcement # {!PreApplication__c.Announcement__c}
Dear {!PreApplication__c.OwnerFullName},
Please click on https://govgrantsdev-developer-edition.na11.force.com?id={!PreApplication__c.ApplicationID__c} to enter additional information.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants support team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
